Thanks Stella, working on this now.

Hello Heath,

As discussed, below changes, massive thanks.

1. Front cover should say 'Edition 3 - 2020' . Also main image on front cover should be different and text is formatted slightly differently too - attached is the latest version you should've been updating...
2. On page 3, WHERE WE SERVICE is quite different to the version attached. Needs to be updated. Not sure why this text has gone missing between the last version and this new draft you've sent us
3. Where you've added VIVA SATIN CHROME HARDWARE on each of pages 4,6,8,10,12,14, the CHROME HARDWARE has been repeated. Please take this out. It should only say VIVA SATIN CHROME HARDWARE
4. Page 10 - can you flip this background image so the female ambulant toilet sign will now be on the left hand side
5. Page 25 - please replace text under the header to be:

Privacy edge can be added to all Duracube partition systems for superior privacy. Supports zero door gaps and keeps bullying at bay in education environments. Providing one of the most private solutions in the industry when combined with Duracube's full height toilet & shower partitions system.

6. Page 25 - thats fine what you've done with this instead of using our images of privacy edge, but could you add the words 'TOP VIEW' above the drawings you've added, then inside the panels write 'DOOR PANEL' and 'NIB PANEL' inside of the shapes like below (just in a smaller blue text). Also can the main image at the bottom of this page be a bit lower so it doesnt reach so high up the page, and the TOP VIEW & drawings go down the page a little bit, so it doesnt look quite so plonked on there...


7. Page 26 - should be 'Zetlan' not Zetland - no 'd' on there.
8. Page 27 - has a lot of blue background, can something else be added to the background to fill in the blank space a bit?

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

Here is the updated file: 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/bmjgi6e43y3bsp3/A4-duracube-product-brochure-2020-30-Nov.pdf?dl=0

A couple of notes:
  • Page 25, the three photos still weren't hitting the mark. Have a look, I opted to draw the concept of privacy instead.
  • Page 26, I needed to do a slightly different layout to fit them all nicely. 
  • Page 27, I didn't do a collage as it was looking messy, I think what we have done best sells the concept that it's a book.2
@jaime here it it is, thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

Final changes to the attached brochure please:

- Anywhere that says '300 SERIES SATIN CHROME HARDWARE' please replace with 'VIVA SATIN CHROME HARDWARE' (it'll be on pages 4,6,8,10,12,14)


- Anywhere that says '300 series cast alloy hardware' please replace with 'Viva satin chrome cast alloy hardware'. (should be pages 5,7,9,11,13,15 under FEATURES and HOW TO SPECIFY US)

- Anywhere that says '300 Series Alloy Hardware or custom hardware as per page 25' please replace with 'Viva Satin Chrome Hardware or any custom hardware as per page 26 '. (should be pages 5,7,9,11,13,15)

- The image on page 6, could it be changed to be this one attached named 'Page6' (please flip the image so the cubicles are on the right hand side)? And change colours at the bottom of that page to say: DOORS: 5578 Slate | PANELS: 464 Barrier Reef

- Update image on page 10 to be attached 'page10'. Update colours: DOORS: 5003 Phillipine Teak | PANELS: 5003 Phillipine Teak

- Page 12 - still says 'Gravity Hinge 3 per door 3' - remove the repeated 3 please

- Update image on page 16 to be attached 'page16' image. Update colours: BENCH: 5578 Slate

- Page 19 - there's 2 new drawings attached to be updated please. Make sure the same headings 'LOCKERS WITHOUT BENCH SEATING'... etc still apply.

- Please update page 24 image to be that attached called 'page 24'.

- Page 25 - please make this a full page just on the privacy edge. Please update page 25 Privacy Edge image to be those attached (you'll have to put them on a white background sorry). There'd be 3 pictures in a row that kind of shows the stages of the board (I imagine it'd be like the below)? So first would be the 1 piece of board on its own, then the 2 pieces of board separated, then lastly the 2 pieces of board jammed together. Not sure if this concept will make it clearer for people to understand privacy edge. Call me if this isn't clear :)


- Then move all CUSTOMISE YOUR PROJECT WITH HARDWARE info from page 25 to page 26 and make it a full page and update as below:
* put the header CUSTOMISE YOUR PROJECT WITH HARDWARE into the same opaque box the other page headings are, with the other text below it. (Please just add a full stop at the end of the 'create your own design.')
* Please add in above the Zetlan hardware, the first 7 images of hardware shown on page 4 (so just dont put the square headrail image in). This hardware range should be called 'VIVA SATIN CHROME HARDWARE'

* Then change as per below.


- For page 27, could we do a collage of inspiration pictures for them with the brag book on top of the collage, and at the top of the page say:

CUSTOMISED PROJECT INSPIRATION
We know designing a commercial bathroom can often be daunting, so we've made this process easier for you with our quality publication of Duracube inspired bathrooms. Contact us to grab your copy.

(try leaving the 'CALL US TODAY AND FIND OUT HOW YOUR NEXT PROJECT...' text at the bottom of page 27. If it looks wrong, take it out, but would be good to keep it).

I'm sorry for the short notice, but as discussed if i could have this draft back urgently, just because we've got to get it to print early next week. Many thanks.

Stella Simpson
